title: The Asset Allocator: 3 Planning Strategies For Times Of Crisis
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Harbor Crest Wealth Advisors’ Mike Hennessy discusses Roth conversions, gifting strategies and qualified HAS funding distribution, planning strategies of particular value in 2020. This podcast (9:02) suggests there are creative planning strategies advisors can employ to help clients during these uniquely challenging times. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
